channel.title: Alejandro González: Software Developer

item.title: About me
item.description: About me Pragmatic software developer focused on delivering reliable software built with both good programming practices, performance and scalability in mind. Familiar and skilled with the software development cycle. Experienced working with teams. Always eager to keep learning and improving. Skillset Languages / Skills C# Javascript Python REST API design Relational databases Architecture Frameworks .NET Core and ASP.NET Core Entity Framework Unit Testing with xUnit/Moq Others Experience integrating third party APIs/Libraries Familiar with mobile development Familiar with Azure environments
